entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, St. Stephen
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 p.m. ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 1.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
